Pacote Base do R)

```{r}
system.time({
  df_base <- read.csv("Dados/flights.csv")
})
```

Pacote readr)

```{r}
library(readr)

system.time({
  df_readr <- read_csv("Dados/flights.csv")
})
```

Do Pandas em Python)

```{python}
library(reticulate)

pd <- import("pandas")

system.time({
  df_pandas <- pd$read_csv("flights.csv")
})
```
